Class Ghost

java.lang.Object
  Pacman.Model.GameCharacter
      Pacman.Model.Ghost
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, GameCharacterInterface
public final class Ghost
extends GameCharacter

This class controls the ghost entities in the game.

deathTime

dead

private boolean dead
Stores whether the ghost is currently dead.

ghostType

private int ghostType
There are four ghost types. They only differ in the image that is drawn to represent them in the view.

simulateStep

boolean simulateStep(Vector position,
                     Vector newDirection)
To check if there will be a collision on the next step, a proxyGhost is generated to simulate the step without the actual ghost actually moving.

Specified by:
simulateStep in class GameCharacter
Parameters:
position - The position of the GameCharacter.
newDirection - The direction to go.
Returns:
true, if GameCharacter can do a step without colliding.

possibleNewDirections

private Vector[] possibleNewDirections()
When stepping, the ghost checks in which directions it could go. These are returned here.

Returns:
possible directions where the ghost could go next.

generateNewDirection

private Vector generateNewDirection()
From all possible directions where the ghost could go, this method chooses one at random.
